summary: A unit‑test module that verifies the correctness and robustness of the mean Intersection‑over‑Union (IoU) metric implementation, covering normal value scenarios and edge cases such as undefined (NaN) results for both per‑class and overall calculations.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable IoU measurements in segmentation workflows, especially in medical imaging applications, by detecting regressions and ensuring the metric behaves correctly under typical and pathological inputs.
